items.sentence: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
I think that for many people learning the trigonometric functions is meaningless.
You're really handy, aren't you? Don't you think you'd make a good house-husband?
If it's badly insulated, it won't warm up regardless of how much heating you use.
The lunch she brought to me was as delicious as I'd heard people say it would be.
Today's paper reports that the premier has given up the idea of visiting America.
I spent the whole afternoon sitting near the pool, watching my children swimming.
As long as it's not too much of a bother, people like to be nice to other people.
Tom wondered how long it would take Mary to realize John wouldn't be coming back.
I no longer have to interact with people I have little to nothing in common with.
